#About Me

My Name is Pujan Parikh and I am Professional Front End Engineer Based in Minneapolis, MN. I mostly specialize in Developing web-apps with Angular or React.

#My Experience

Dec 17 - Present
Front End Engineer

Description
• Working with the team to create a Modern Web UI for Netbackup.
• Collaborating with Back-end Teams to create a Parity with Existing product with Modern UX.
• Using Angular as a primary framework for best performance.
• Implementing Reactive programming approach throughout the app using RxJS.
• Using Lodash, Sass, Datatable, VDL as a few tools to create clean and reusable code.

•Worked with Veritas Design Language(VDL) team to create a Library based on material Angular Which is used by all the Web application products for Veritas.

June 2017 - August 2017
Software Engineering Inern

Description
• Worked with the core team to optimize existing, and implement new features on the primary page of Shutterfly.
• Implemented various web-page optimization techniques like lazy loading, Minifying JS and CSS files, Deferring on webpages for the best UX.
• Researched most efficient image compression tools and apply it to the entire image assets of the website.
• Turned ideas and mock-ups into new features using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSP.

April 2017 - June 2017
Front End Engineer Intern

Description
• Worked with a team to create a web app product in agile settings.
• Designed and developed UI of the product from scratch to production ready.
• Used Angular As a primary framework to work flawlessly with the Backend (Java Spring Boot and Firebase).
• Technologies Used: Angular, Firebase Cloud Notifications, Service Workers Git(BitBucket), RESTful APIs, AWS (EC2).

November 2014 - June 2015
Web Developer

Description
• Designed Emailers and landing pages according to the clients request.
• Converted static webpage to responsive and mobile-friendly interface.
• Involved in Implementation of a feature for a client to build a custom web-mailer with personalized functionalities by generating a bill of their customers.

#portfolio

Tripwale

A web app to plan a personalized time bound trip for a city per user likes and time.

•A web app to plan a personalized time bound trip for a city per user likes and time.
•It is a complete infrastructure with build in planner, explorer and analytics.
•The trip planner will give multiple results which user can choose from, based on user inputs like city, attraction types, time, number of places etc.
•Upon retrieving all the options from user, the app will plan the best possible places to visit and give a shortest route with details of the same.
•The explorer is a side feature which takes any keyword input from the user and searches for nearby places related to that keyword. It could be anything like bar, dinner, hike etc.
•The analytics page displays the popularity of the cities, places according to time, day etc. in various graphs and charts.
•Heat-map is also used to display the density of the people that have visited to the various parts of the city on the map.
